name: better-aliases
title: Better Aliases
description: Better Aliases - Create better aliases in Raycast
author: alexi.build

commands.name: view-leader-key-as-keyboard-layout
commands.title: View Leader Key as Keyboard Layout
commands.description: Visualizes the leader key configuration as a keyboard layout.

preferences.name: hideAccessories
preferences.title: Display Options
preferences.description: Configure how list items are displayed
preferences.label: Show less data in list view

preferences.name: snippetPrefix
preferences.title: Snippet Prefix
preferences.description: Single character prefix to trigger snippet mode (text insertion instead of opening)

preferences.name: randomizedSnippetSeparator
preferences.title: Randomized Snippet Separator
preferences.description: Character or string to separate snippet values for random selection (e.g., ';;' to separate 'Hello there!;;Good morning!;;How are you today?')

preferences.name: betterAliasesConfigPath
preferences.title: Better Aliases Config Path
preferences.description: Path to the Better Aliases configuration file (optional, defaults to ~/.config/better-aliases/better-aliases.json)

preferences.name: leaderKeyConfigPath
preferences.title: Leader Key Config Path
preferences.description: Path to the leader key configuration file

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
